name: Ballista bolt
description: A massive bolt with a cast iron arrow head. Can only be used in a Ballista Turret. If it doesn't break, you can recover your ammo.

name: Cannon ball
description: A gigantic ball of heavy metal, capable of demolishing very strong structures.

name: Chain bola
description: A gigantic bola made of metal chain, capable of ensnaring larger creatures. Usuable within a Ballista turret.
